query: SELECT t.id, t.title, t.`index`, COUNT(ta.id) as asset_count FROM tracks t LEFT JOIN trackAssets ta ON t.id = ta.trackId WHERE t.albumId = (SELECT id FROM albums ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY t.`index`
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.38fa72cffd94 --database b5PCTDMDy4xxT8TnZ4kC9Z --execute SELECT t.id, t.title, t.`index`, COUNT(ta.id) as asset_count FROM tracks t LEFT JOIN trackAssets ta ON t.id = ta.trackId WHERE t.albumId = (SELECT id FROM albums ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY t.`index`
